entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be forged on a plane that is not Sigil or the Material Plane

Armor Effects: Armor made from this metal enhances teleportation magic. When the wearer is teleported they are teleported 50% further. Also the armor holds a unique rune set for Teleportation Circle, allowing it to be chosen as a location.

Weapon Effects: Dealing damage with this weapon causes the target to make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failure they are planarly fatigued. If the target teleports or changes planes they take force damage equal to 10 x the level of spell that moved them. This fatigue lasts for 24 hours.
Additional Effects: When using Keystone Mason's Tools the time it takes to cast spells that require the creation of glyphs or magical circles is halved.
